        createVetor: creates a vector whose values are in a given range and which are multiples of the given scalar
        Parameters:
        scalar - Represents the scalar that is a multiple of the elements of the resultant vector
        init - Represents the init of range
        stop - Represents the end of range
        Returns:
        vector the final vector.
